nodes.text: Jedi outposts are satellite-training facilities created by the Jedi Order. They were built after the Jedi encountered Darth Maul of the Sith Order. They were attacked and destroyed throughout the galaxy during the Clone Wars around 22 BBY.
Jedi outposts appear in the Jedi Destiny portion of the 2012 Kinect exclusive video game Kinect Star Wars.
